name: Micro Interaction Rating
description:
Micro Interaction Rating to use to evaluate your app or website! This kit includes example complete interactions for your project, it can be edited and modified to your needs without problem.


All elements and assets used are open source and royalty free, so feel free to use them in a commercial project, just remember to credit the author Julio Cacko.


If you are interested in other systems like this, take a look at my profile too!


Update v 1.1

  • Add Disable Option
